cards.title: Source Data Formats
cards.body: The BES can ingest source data stored as HDF4, HDF4-EOS, HDF5, HDF5-EOS  NetCDF-3, NetCDF-4, CEDAR, FITS, CSV, and Raw ASCII and binary formats. Because of Hyraxâ€™s extensible design, it's easy to add new source data formats.

cards.title: Data Retrieval Formats
cards.body: Hyrax is able to return data in DAP, DAP4, NetCDF-3, NetCDF-4, JSON, CSV, and ASCII formats. You can also add your own response types.
